Name: LargeChain
Notes: A long decorative chain with a configurable length.

Obj_arg0.Name: Chain Length
Obj_arg0.Description: The length of the chain which determines the number of segments. This value should be explicitly specified.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene. Its special cutscene nerve action causes the chain to break.
